mainCard.title: The power of authentic conversation
mainCard.paragraph1: Research by Mallory et al. (2022) showed that open communication in the intimate sphere significantly increases relationship satisfaction. Regular dialogues about needs and fantasies allow partners to build lasting emotional bonds.
mainCard.paragraph2: Secret Sparks facilitates these conversations, enabling safe sharing of desires and discovering common interests without fear of misunderstandings. It's an effective way to deepen mutual understanding and build an intimate relationship based on authentic communication.

sideCard.title: Communication and desire
sideCard.description: A study by Montesi et al. (2011) proved that honest conversation about sex enhances satisfaction and bond. Secret Sparks facilitates such dialogue through anonymous surveys and personalized reports that identify common interests without pressuring partners, leading to a deeper and more satisfying relationship.

feature1.title: Hormones of closeness
feature1.description: Feldman et al. (2012) showed that frequent physical contact increases oxytocin levels, strengthening trust and sense of security in a relationship. Secret Sparks offers rituals and activity suggestions that promote the production of this "love hormone" and build lasting attachment.

feature2.title: Satisfaction and happiness
feature2.description: Schmiedeberg et al. (2017) demonstrated a significant relationship between frequency of intercourse and overall feeling of happiness and life satisfaction. Secret Sparks inspires the discovery of new sensations and maintaining enthusiasm in a relationship, which directly translates to overall life satisfaction.

feature3.title: Balance in relationship
feature3.description: Gola's study (2019) indicates that higher sexual satisfaction promotes better well-being and increases the level of commitment in a relationship. Secret Sparks helps couples better understand each other's needs and desires, leading to balance and harmony in an intimate relationship.

whatIs.title: What is Secret Sparks?
whatIs.description: Secret Sparks is an application created for couples who want to safely and discreetly explore new areas of their intimate life. Each partner completes a short, anonymous questionnaire – ensuring that no personal answers are shared with the other person. Secret AI analyzes sexual preferences, relationship map, and then presents a personalized report and practical suggestions on how to improve your sex life.

step1.title: Complete the survey
step1.description: Each partner individually completes the survey, rating on a scale from 1 to 4 their excitement and willingness to compromise with various types of intimate activities.

step2.title: Invite your partner
step2.description: After completing the survey, you'll receive a link to send to your partner so they can complete their part. This enables Secret AI to create the report.

step3.title: Receive your report
step3.description: After both surveys are completed, you'll receive a report with an analysis of your sex life and suggestions. It only includes activities that both of you are interested in.

step4.title: Rediscover sex
step4.description: Consider this as a starting point to diversify your intimate life. By implementing the suggestions from the report, you can raise the level of satisfaction and closeness in your relationship.

gameLevels.title: Game levels
gameLevels.description: Secret Sparks offers three levels of advancement, tailored to your preferences and readiness to explore:

discover.title: Discover
discover.description: For couples who want to discover basic fantasies and diversify their intimate relationship.

explore.title: Explore
explore.description: For couples who are ready for deeper exploration of their fantasies and desires.

exceed.title: Exceed
exceed.description: For brave couples who want to push boundaries and discover unusual experiences.

question1.question: Will my partner see my answers?
question1.answer: No, your individual answers remain completely private. Your partner will never see your specific choices. In the report, we only present common areas of interest, without revealing individual preferences.

question2.question: How long does it take to complete the survey?
question2.answer: Completing the survey takes an average of 5-10 minutes. It depends on the chosen level (Discover, Explore, or Exceed) and how much time you spend considering each question. It's worth dedicating appropriate time to this task to get the most precise results.

question3.question: Can I change my answers after saving them?
question3.answer: Yes, while filling out the survey, you can freely go back to previous questions and change your answers. However, after completing the survey and generating the report, the answers are locked and cannot be changed. If needed, you can always fill out a new survey.

question4.question: How long do I have access to the report?
question4.answer: After generating the report, you have unlimited access to it. The report is sent to the provided email address, so you can return to it whenever you want. For your security and privacy, all survey data is deleted from our servers 7 days after generating the report, but the report itself remains available to you.
